name: 'Tis the season to change
description:
'TIS THE SEASON TO CHANGE *ENGLISH* Intro

This is the story of John , a man so obssesed with his job that he forgot things that are more important. Make your choices through John's story and see what would happen if it was you.

Language

Available in English and Spanish

Credits

Created and Developed by: Kenflin (Mario Herrera)

*ESPAÑOL* Intro

Esta es la historia de John , un hombre tan obsesionado con su trabajo que olvidó cosas mas importantes. Toma tus decisiones en la historia de  John y comprueba que pasaría si fueses tú. if it was you.

Idioma

Disponible en inglés y español.
